query.statement:
UPDATE SAPHEE.ZPST0134 SET ZSITE_NM = #ZSITE_NM# ,ZSITE_ADDR = #ZSITE_ADDR# ,CONTR_DA = #CONTR_DA# ,SCONTDT = #SCONTDT# ,CHAGDT = #CHAGDT# ,JUNDT = #JUNDT# ,SENDDT = #SENDDT# ,CONTAMT = #CONTAMT# ,CONTHAMT = #CONTHAMT# ,SCONTAMT = #SCONTAMT# ,SCONTHAMT = #SCONTHAMT# ,SIGONGAMT = #SIGONGAMT# ,SIGONGHAMT = #SIGONGHAMT# ,SUPAMT = #SUPAMT# ,SUPHAMT = #SUPHAMT# ,SCONTWAMT = #SCONTWAMT# ,SCONTWHAMT = #SCONTWHAMT# ,VAT = #VAT# ,HVAT = #HVAT# ,RATE = #RATE# ,ZQNTY = #ZQNTY# ,NAME1 = #NAME1# ,REP = #REP# ,LIFNR = #LIFNR# ,CONUM = #CONUM# ,LICNUM = #LICNUM# ,LICDT = #LICDT# ,OPENDT = #OPENDT# ,TELF1 = #TELF1# ,ADDR = #ADDR# ,SITE_REP = #SITE_REP# ,SITE_JUNO = #SITE_JUNO# ,CERTNO = #CERTNO# ,ITEM = #ITEM# ,GRADE = #GRADE# ,CELLP = #CELLP# ,CERTDT = #CERTDT# ,UPID = #G_USER_ID# ,UDATE = HEX(CURRENT DATE)
WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND POSID = #POSID# AND SEQ = #SEQ#
